column1: [Wojnarowski] Undrafted UCSB G JaQuori McLaughlin has agreed to a deal with the Golden State Warriors, source tells ESPN.
[Wojnarowski] Undrafted UCSB G JaQuori McLaughlin has agreed to a deal with the Golden State Warriors, source tells ESPN.
Warriors sign UDFA G JaQuori McLaughlin out of UCSB
[MacMahon] Source: Mavs are signing guard JaQuori McLaughlin to a two-way deal. He played for the Warriors’ summer league team.
